aws_dx_hosted_private_virtual_interface_.description: Provides a resource to manage the accepter's side of a Direct Connect hosted private virtual interface.

virtual_interface_id.description: The ID of the Direct Connect virtual interface to accept.

dx_gateway_id.description: The ID of the Direct Connect gateway to which to connect the virtual interface.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

vpn_gateway_id.description: The ID of the [virtual private gateway](vpn_gateway.html

id.description: The ID of the virtual interface.

arn.description: The ARN of the virtual interface.
